page.title: 07PROCTER AND GAMBLE (TWO)
page.content:
Some of the products that they sell are BOLD, BOUNCE, ARIEL, CAMAY and CREST.
The car park of Procter and Gamble is watched by a security camera. There is also very strict security about going into the offices. We had to get a special badge before we could go inside.
The working day is eight hours and 50% of the staff are women.
Underneath the building there is a boiler room. On the first floor there are directors' offices and also the board room where the directors make important decisions.
